get.description: This endpoint returns the transferable balance of a specified account.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Trading pair, required when the account type is ISOLATED; other types are not passed, e.g.: BTC-USDT

available.description: Funds available to withdraw or trade.

holds.description: Funds on hold (not available for use).

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint returns the transferable balance of a specified account.

post.description: This interface can be used for transfers between master and sub accounts and inner transfers
post.x-sdk-method-description: This interface can be used for transfers between master and sub accounts and inner transfers

clientOid.description: Unique order id created by users to identify their orders, e.g. UUID, with a maximum length of 128 bits

amount.description: Transfer amount, the amount is a positive integer multiple of the currency precision.

fromUserId.description: Transfer out UserId， This is required when transferring sub-account to master-account. It is optional for internal transfers.

fromAccountTag.description: Symbol, required when the account type is ISOLATED or ISOLATED_V2, for example: BTC-USDT

type.description: Transfer type：INTERNAL(Transfer within account)、PARENT_TO_SUB(Transfer from master-account to sub-account)，SUB_TO_PARENT(Transfer from sub-account to master-account)

toUserId.description: Transfer in UserId， This is required when transferring master-account to sub-account. It is optional for internal transfers.

toAccountTag.description: Symbol, required when the account type is ISOLATED or ISOLATED_V2, for example: BTC-USDT

post.description: Funds in the main account, trading account and margin account of a Master Account can be transferred to the main account, trading account, futures account and margin account of its Sub-Account. The futures account of both the Master Account and Sub-Account can only accept funds transferred in from the main account, trading account and margin account and cannot transfer out to these accounts.
post.x-sdk-method-description: Funds in the main account, trading account and margin account of a Master Account can be transferred to the main account, trading account, futures account and margin account of its Sub-Account. The futures account of both the Master Account and Sub-Account can only accept funds transferred in from the main account, trading account and margin account and cannot transfer out to these accounts.

clientOid.description: Unique order id created by users to identify their orders, e.g. UUID, with a maximum length of 128 bits

amount.description: Transfer amount, the amount is a positive integer multiple of the currency precision.

direction.description:
OUT — the master user to sub user
IN — the sub user to the master user.

subUserId.description: the user ID of a sub-account.

post.description: This API endpoint can be used to transfer funds between accounts internally. Users can transfer funds between their account free of charge.
post.x-sdk-method-description: This API endpoint can be used to transfer funds between accounts internally. Users can transfer funds between their account free of charge.

clientOid.description: Unique order id created by users to identify their orders, e.g. UUID, with a maximum length of 128 bits

amount.description: Transfer amount, the amount is a positive integer multiple of the currency precision.

to.description: Receiving Account Type: main, trade, margin, isolated, margin_v2, isolated_v2, contract

fromTag.description: Trading pair, required when the payment account type is isolated, e.g.: BTC-USDT

toTag.description: Trading pair, required when the payment account type is isolated, e.g.: BTC-USDT

from.description: Payment Account Type: main, trade, margin, isolated, margin_v2, isolated_v2

post.description: The amount to be transferred will be deducted from the KuCoin Futures Account. Please ensure that you have sufficient funds in your KuCoin Futures Account, or the transfer will fail.

status.description: Status:APPLY, PROCESSING, PENDING_APPROVAL, APPROVED, REJECTED, PENDING_CANCEL, CANCEL, SUCCESS

post.x-sdk-method-description: The amount to be transferred will be deducted from the KuCoin Futures Account. Please ensure that you have sufficient funds in your KuCoin Futures Account, or the transfer will fail.

amount.description: Amount to be transfered out, the maximum cannot exceed 1000000000

post.description: The amount to be transferred will be deducted from the payAccount. Please ensure that you have sufficient funds in your payAccount Account, or the transfer will fail.
post.x-sdk-method-description: The amount to be transferred will be deducted from the payAccount. Please ensure that you have sufficient funds in your payAccount Account, or the transfer will fail.

get.summary: Get Futures Account Transfer Out Ledger
get.description: This endpoint can get futures account transfer out ledger

parameters.name: currentPage
parameters.description: Current request page, The default currentPage is 1

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can get futures account transfer out ledger
